Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that uses sound to allow two students to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate and label the use of string as a key part of the device to carry sound between two students.
The student can show how the students are able to send and receive information using the device they designed.
The student can illustrate materials used in the design that keep the string tight between the two students, ensuring sound can travel effectively.
The student can depict how this device solves the problem of communicating over a distance using everyday materials.
